com.codecool.shop.model

Class Product

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseModel
      • com.codecool.shop.model.Product

  • public class Product
extends BaseModel
    This is a product class of shop application.

    various attributes of product and related behaviour.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Product

        public Product(int id,
               java.lang.String name,
               float defaultPrice,
               java.lang.String currencyString,
               java.lang.String description,
               ProductCategory productCategory,
               Supplier supplier)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        id - is a must have info with the help of this we can collect the information about the product from the database.
        name - is another important content, the name of the product.
        defaultPrice - this is the unit price of the product.
        currencyString - the currency of the price.
        description - short description about the product which will appear beside the product name.
        productCategory - the product has category as well so we can filter them
        supplier - the product also has supplier for filter purposes.
